mapper.select: select * from notice_board order by b_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice_board(b_serialno, b_no, b_addinfo, b_detailinfo, b_title, b_writer, u_id, b_content) values (#{b_serialno}, seq_notice.nextval, #{b_no}, #{b_addinfo}, #{b_detailinfo}, #{b_title}, #{b_writer}, #{u_id}, #{b_content})
